snippet: Los Angeles Rams defensive end Robert Quinn raised his fist and San Francisco 49ers backup quarterback Colin Kaepernick was among several players who knelt during performances of the U.S. national anthem on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Rams defensive end Robert Quinn raised his fist and San Francisco 49ers backup quarterback Colin Kaepernick was among several players who knelt during performances of the U.S. national anthem on Sunday.

headline.main: More Kneeling Players, Raised Fists, in Anthem Protests
headline.print_headline: More Kneeling Players, Raised Fists, in Anthem Protests
